mapper.select: SELECT * FROM eqpt_outrepository ORDER BY outId DESC
SELECT id FROM eqpt_material WHERE sn = #{sn} AND bn = #{bn} AND id = #{id}
SELECT outId FROM eqpt_outrepository WHERE outId LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{outId},'%'))
mapper.update: UPDATE eqpt_outrepository SET INST_ID_ = #{instid} WHERE INST_ID_ = ''

UPDATE eqpt_outrepository
secondOne = #{arg1},
thirdOne = #{arg2},
fourthOne = #{arg3},
WHERE INST_ID_ = #{arg0}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT F_WDBH AS outId FROM w_lysq WHERE F_WDBH NOT IN (SELECT outInfo FROM eqpt_outrepository) AND INST_STATUS_ = 'SUCCESS_END' UNION SELECT DISTINCT F_WDBH AS outId FROM w_zdsqd12 WHERE F_WDBH NOT IN (SELECT outInfo FROM eqpt_outrepository) AND INST_STATUS_ = 'SUCCESS_END'

SELECT DISTINCT F_WDBH AS outId FROM w_xsfhtzd WHERE F_WDBH NOT IN (SELECT outInfo FROM eqpt_outrepository) AND INST_STATUS_ = 'SUCCESS_END' UNION SELECT DISTINCT F_WDBH AS outId FROM w_xsddhtpsb1 WHERE F_WDBH NOT IN (SELECT outInfo FROM eqpt_outrepository) AND INST_STATUS_ = 'SUCCESS_END' UNION SELECT DISTINCT F_WDBH AS outId FROM w_htjfxqd5 WHERE F_WDBH NOT IN (SELECT outInfo FROM eqpt_outrepository) AND INST_STATUS_ = 'SUCCESS_END'
SELECT DISTINCT wdbh AS outId FROM w_xsfhtzd

SELECT w_lylymx.F_WLBM AS materialId,w_lylymx.F_WLMC AS materialName,w_lylymx.F_GGXH AS spec,w_lylymx.F_LYSL AS outNum,w_jyd.F_XLH AS sn,(eqpt_material.unit) AS unit,eqpt_material.remark AS remark FROM eqpt_material,w_lylymx,w_jyd WHERE w_lylymx.REF_ID_ = (SELECT DISTINCT ID_ FROM w_lysq WHERE F_WDBH = #{wdbh} ORDER BY ID_ DESC LIMIT 1) AND eqpt_material.id = w_lylymx.F_WLBM AND w_jyd.F_WLBM = eqpt_material.id UNION SELECT w_lylymx.F_WLBM AS materialId,w_lylymx.F_WLMC AS materialName,w_lylymx.F_GGXH AS spec,w_lylymx.F_LYSL AS outNum,'' AS sn,(eqpt_material.unit) AS unit,eqpt_material.remark AS remark FROM eqpt_material,w_lylymx,w_jyd WHERE w_lylymx.REF_ID_ = (SELECT DISTINCT ID_ FROM w_lysq WHERE F_WDBH = #{wdbh} ORDER BY ID_ DESC LIMIT 1) AND eqpt_material.id = w_lylymx.F_WLBM AND eqpt_material.id = ANY(SELECT id FROM eqpt_material WHERE eqpt_material.id not in (SELECT F_WLBM FROM w_jyd)) UNION SELECT w_lymx13.F_WLBM AS materialId,w_lymx13.F_WLMC AS materialName,w_lymx13.F_GGXH AS spec,w_lymx13.F_LYSL AS outNum,w_jyd.F_XLH AS sn,(eqpt_material.unit) AS unit,eqpt_material.remark AS remark FROM eqpt_material,w_lymx13,w_jyd WHERE w_lymx13.REF_ID_ = (SELECT DISTINCT ID_ FROM w_zdsqd12 WHERE F_WDBH = #{wdbh} ORDER BY ID_ DESC LIMIT 1) AND eqpt_material.id = w_lymx13.F_WLBM AND w_jyd.F_WLBM = eqpt_material.id UNION SELECT w_lymx13.F_WLBM AS materialId,w_lymx13.F_WLMC AS materialName,w_lymx13.F_GGXH AS spec,w_lymx13.F_LYSL AS outNum,'' AS sn,(eqpt_material.unit) AS unit,eqpt_material.remark AS remark FROM eqpt_material,w_lymx13,w_jyd WHERE w_lymx13.REF_ID_ = (SELECT DISTINCT ID_ FROM w_zdsqd12 WHERE F_WDBH = #{wdbh} ORDER BY ID_ DESC LIMIT 1) AND eqpt_material.id = w_lymx13.F_WLBM AND eqpt_material.id = ANY(SELECT id FROM eqpt_material WHERE eqpt_material.id not in (SELECT F_WLBM FROM w_jyd)) ORDER BY materialId

SELECT w_cpmx.F_WLBM AS materialId,w_cpmx.F_WLMC AS materialName,w_cpmx.F_GGXH AS spec,w_cpmx.F_XQSL AS outNum,w_jyd.F_XLH AS sn,(eqpt_material.unit) AS unit,eqpt_material.remark AS remark FROM eqpt_material,w_cpmx,w_jyd WHERE w_cpmx.REF_ID_ = (SELECT DISTINCT ID_ FROM w_xsfhtzd WHERE F_WDBH = #{wdbh} ORDER BY ID_ DESC LIMIT 1) AND eqpt_material.id = w_cpmx.F_WLBM AND w_jyd.F_WLBM = eqpt_material.id UNION SELECT w_cpmx.F_WLBM AS materialId,w_cpmx.F_WLMC AS materialName,w_cpmx.F_GGXH AS spec,w_cpmx.F_XQSL AS outNum,'' AS sn,(eqpt_material.unit) AS unit,eqpt_material.remark AS remark FROM eqpt_material,w_cpmx,w_jyd WHERE w_cpmx.REF_ID_ = (SELECT DISTINCT ID_ FROM w_xsfhtzd WHERE F_WDBH = #{wdbh} ORDER BY ID_ DESC LIMIT 1) AND eqpt_material.id = w_cpmx.F_WLBM AND eqpt_material.id = ANY(SELECT id FROM eqpt_material WHERE eqpt_material.id not in (SELECT F_WLBM FROM w_jyd)) UNION SELECT w_xsmx5.F_WLBM AS materialId,w_xsmx5.F_WLMC AS materialName,w_xsmx5.F_GGXH AS spec,w_xsmx5.F_XQSL AS outNum,w_jyd.F_XLH AS sn,(eqpt_material.unit) AS unit,eqpt_material.remark AS remark FROM eqpt_material,w_xsmx5,w_jyd WHERE w_xsmx5.REF_ID_ = (SELECT DISTINCT ID_ FROM w_xsfhtzd WHERE F_WDBH = #{wdbh} ORDER BY ID_ DESC LIMIT 1) AND eqpt_material.id = w_xsmx5.F_WLBM AND w_jyd.F_WLBM = eqpt_material.id UNION SELECT w_xsmx5.F_WLBM AS materialId,w_xsmx5.F_WLMC AS materialName,w_xsmx5.F_GGXH AS spec,w_xsmx5.F_XQSL AS outNum,'' AS sn,(eqpt_material.unit) AS unit,eqpt_material.remark AS remark FROM eqpt_material,w_xsmx5,w_jyd WHERE w_xsmx5.REF_ID_ = (SELECT DISTINCT ID_ FROM w_xsfhtzd WHERE F_WDBH = #{wdbh} ORDER BY ID_ DESC LIMIT 1) AND eqpt_material.id = w_xsmx5.F_WLBM AND eqpt_material.id = ANY(SELECT id FROM eqpt_material WHERE eqpt_material.id not in (SELECT F_WLBM FROM w_jyd)) UNION SELECT w_xsmx3.F_WLBM AS materialId,w_xsmx3.F_WLMC AS materialName,w_xsmx3.F_GGXH AS spec,w_xsmx3.F_XSSL AS outNum,w_jyd.F_XLH AS sn,(eqpt_material.unit) AS unit,eqpt_material.remark AS remark FROM eqpt_material,w_xsmx3,w_jyd WHERE w_xsmx3.REF_ID_ = (SELECT DISTINCT ID_ FROM w_xsfhtzd WHERE F_WDBH = #{wdbh} ORDER BY ID_ DESC LIMIT 1) AND eqpt_material.id = w_xsmx3.F_WLBM AND w_jyd.F_WLBM = eqpt_material.id UNION SELECT w_xsmx3.F_WLBM AS materialId,w_xsmx3.F_WLMC AS materialName,w_xsmx3.F_GGXH AS spec,w_xsmx3.F_XSSL AS outNum,'' AS sn,(eqpt_material.unit) AS unit,eqpt_material.remark AS remark FROM eqpt_material,w_xsmx3,w_jyd WHERE w_xsmx3.REF_ID_ = (SELECT DISTINCT ID_ FROM w_xsfhtzd WHERE F_WDBH = #{wdbh} ORDER BY ID_ DESC LIMIT 1) AND eqpt_material.id = w_xsmx3.F_WLBM AND eqpt_material.id = ANY(SELECT id FROM eqpt_material WHERE eqpt_material.id not in (SELECT F_WLBM FROM w_jyd)) ORDER BY materialId

SELECT w_xsfhtzd.wlbh AS materialId,w_xsfhtzd.wlmc AS materialName,w_xsfhtzd.ggxh AS spec,w_xsfhtzd.xqsl AS outNum,w_xsfhtzd.pch_xlh AS sn,(eqpt_material.unit) AS unit,eqpt_material.remark AS remark FROM eqpt_material,w_xsfhtzd WHERE REF_ID_ = (SELECT DISTINCT ID_ FROM w_xsfhtzd WHERE F_WDBH = #{wdbh}) AND eqpt_material.id = w_xsfhtzd.wlbh
SELECT DISTINCT F_XLH FROM w_jyd WHERE F_WLBM = #{materialId}
SELECT * FROM eqpt_outrepository WHERE INST_ID_ = #{instId}
SELECT TASK_DEF_KEY_ FROM act_ru_task WHERE PROC_INST_ID_ = #{taskid}
SELECT * FROM eqpt_outrepository WHERE INST_ID_ = #{instId} ORDER BY outId DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT outId FROM eqpt_outrepository_draft WHERE materialId = #{materialId} AND outId = #{outId}
SELECT * FROM eqpt_outrepository_draft WHERE outId = #{outId}
SELECT * FROM eqpt_outrepository_draft ORDER BY outId DESC

SELECT '领用申请单' AS F_BDMC, F_WDBH, F_SQR_NAME, F_TXRQ, F_XMBH, F_XMMC FROM w_lysq WHERE F_WDBH NOT IN (SELECT outInfo FROM eqpt_outrepository) AND INST_STATUS_ = 'SUCCESS_END' UNION SELECT '招待申请单' AS F_BDMC, F_WDBH, F_SQR_NAME, F_TXRQ, F_XMBH, F_XMMC FROM w_zdsqd12 WHERE F_WDBH NOT IN (SELECT outInfo FROM eqpt_outrepository) AND INST_STATUS_ = 'SUCCESS_END'

SELECT '销售发货通知单' AS F_BDMC, F_WDBH, F_SQR_NAME, F_TXRQ, F_XMBH, F_XMMC FROM w_xsfhtzd WHERE F_WDBH NOT IN (SELECT outInfo FROM eqpt_outrepository) AND INST_STATUS_ = 'SUCCESS_END' UNION SELECT '合同交付需求单' AS F_BDMC, F_WDBH, F_SQR_NAME, F_TXRQ, F_XMBH, F_XMMC FROM w_htjfxqd5 WHERE F_WDBH NOT IN (SELECT outInfo FROM eqpt_outrepository) AND INST_STATUS_ = 'SUCCESS_END' UNION SELECT '销售订单合同评审表' AS F_BDMC, F_WDBH, F_SQR_NAME, F_TXRQ, F_XMBH, F_XMMC FROM w_xsddhtpsb1 WHERE F_WDBH NOT IN (SELECT outInfo FROM eqpt_outrepository) AND INST_STATUS_ = 'SUCCESS_END'

SELECT F_WLBM AS id, F_WLMC AS name, F_GGXH AS spec, F_XQSL AS num, '' AS price, '' AS sum FROM w_cpmx,w_xsfhtzd WHERE w_cpmx.REF_ID_ = (SELECT ID_ FROM w_xsfhtzd WHERE F_WDBH = #{wdbh}) AND w_xsfhtzd.INST_STATUS_ = 'SUCCESS_END' UNION SELECT F_WLBM AS id, F_WLMC AS name, F_GGXH AS spec, F_XQSL AS num, '' AS price, '' AS sum FROM w_xsmx5,w_htjfxqd5 WHERE w_xsmx5.REF_ID_ = (SELECT ID_ FROM w_htjfxqd5 WHERE F_WDBH = #{wdbh}) AND w_htjfxqd5.INST_STATUS_ = 'SUCCESS_END' UNION SELECT F_WLBM AS id, F_WLMC AS name, F_GGXH AS spec, F_XSSL AS num, F_XSDJ AS price, F_XSJE AS sum FROM w_xsmx3,w_xsddhtpsb1 WHERE w_xsmx3.REF_ID_ = (SELECT ID_ FROM w_xsddhtpsb1 WHERE F_WDBH = #{wdbh}) AND w_xsddhtpsb1.INST_STATUS_ = 'SUCCESS_END' UNION SELECT F_WLBM AS id, F_WLMC AS name, F_GGXH AS spec, F_LYSL AS num, F_KCJ AS price, F_JE AS sum FROM w_lylymx,w_lysq WHERE w_lylymx.REF_ID_ = (SELECT ID_ FROM w_lysq WHERE F_WDBH = #{wdbh}) AND w_lysq.INST_STATUS_ = 'SUCCESS_END' UNION SELECT F_WLBM AS id, F_WLMC AS name, F_GGXH AS spec, F_LYSL AS num, F_KCJ AS price, F_JE AS sum FROM w_lymx13,w_zdsqd12 WHERE w_lymx13.REF_ID_ = (SELECT ID_ FROM w_zdsqd12 WHERE F_WDBH = #{wdbh}) AND w_zdsqd12.INST_STATUS_ = 'SUCCESS_END'

SELECT DISTINCT '领用申请单' AS firstOne, F_WDBH AS secondOne, F_SQR_NAME AS thirdOne, F_TXRQ AS fourthOne, F_XMBH AS bn, F_XMMC AS sn FROM w_lysq WHERE F_WDBH NOT IN (SELECT outInfo FROM eqpt_outrepository) AND INST_STATUS_ = 'SUCCESS_END' UNION SELECT DISTINCT '招待申请单' AS firstOne, F_WDBH AS secondOne, F_SQR_NAME AS thirdOne, F_TXRQ AS fourthOne, F_XMBH AS bn, F_XMMC AS sn FROM w_zdsqd12 WHERE F_WDBH NOT IN (SELECT outInfo FROM eqpt_outrepository) AND INST_STATUS_ = 'SUCCESS_END'

SELECT '销售发货通知单' AS firstOne, F_WDBH AS secondOne, F_SQR_NAME AS thirdOne, F_TXRQ AS fourthOne, F_XMBH AS bn, F_XMMC AS sn FROM w_xsfhtzd WHERE F_WDBH NOT IN (SELECT outInfo FROM eqpt_outrepository) AND INST_STATUS_ = 'SUCCESS_END' UNION SELECT '合同交付需求单' AS firstOne, F_WDBH AS secondOne, F_SQR_NAME AS thirdOne, F_TXRQ AS fourthOne, F_XMBH AS bn, F_XMMC AS sn FROM w_htjfxqd5 WHERE F_WDBH NOT IN (SELECT outInfo FROM eqpt_outrepository) AND INST_STATUS_ = 'SUCCESS_END' UNION SELECT '销售订单合同评审表' AS firstOne, F_WDBH AS secondOne, F_SQR_NAME AS thirdOne, F_TXRQ AS fourthOne, F_XMBH AS bn, F_XMMC AS sn FROM w_xsddhtpsb1 WHERE F_WDBH NOT IN (SELECT outInfo FROM eqpt_outrepository) AND INST_STATUS_ = 'SUCCESS_END'
